name: Sweet Veil
summary: Prevents the user and its allies from falling asleep. Rest and Yawn will fail.
viability: Although this ability works better in doubles, not having the be susceptible to sleeping makes Slurpuff a pretty good support Pok√©mon in singles. In Doubles and Triples, however, this is better because the teammates will never have to worry about falling asleep, and can possibly set up as a result.
